title: Bitcoin's Value as an Asset Class
description: Cryptocurrencies are worthy alternatives to investments like bonds and gold, as well as real estate and art, says Bitcoin entrepreneur Dan Held.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Cryptocurrencies are worthy alternatives to investments like bonds and gold, as well as real estate and art, says Bitcoin entrepreneur Dan Held.
